column5: Well boys and girls, I am now inside 2 weeks before our trip to Deer Horn Lodge begins. Man I can't wait. The weather appears to have returned to a more seasonable pattern. I have all the gear ready to go. The boat is ship shape. And I have a new weapon this year...my Humminbird 788ci with Navionics Premium of the Cabonga Resevoir! I am a happy man right now. I can't believe the quality of that map. I am so looking forward to using that this year.
